code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EditSerwisant(){const{obszarId}=useParams();const[serwisant,setSerwisant]=useState({id:'',nazwisko:'',email:''});const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();axios.put("/api/obszary/".concat(obszarId,"/serwisant"),serwisant).then(()=>alert('Serwisant updated successfully!')).catch(error=>console.error('Error updating serwisant',error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Edit Technician"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"nazwisko",className:"form-label",children:"Surname"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"nazwisko",value:serwisant.nazwisko,onChange:e=>setSerwisant({...serwisant,nazwisko:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",className:"form-label",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"form-control",id:"email",value:serwisant.email,onChange:e=>setSerwisant({...serwisant,email:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Submit"})]})]});}export default EditSerwisant;
